input.sentences: i visited the museum with my class yesterday .
we saw some famous marble sculptures .
there were some sculptures made from metal too .
my favorite was the carving into the column near the stairs .
this weird ship mixed media piece was really cool too .
output.sentences: Yesterday we visited the museum of art in the downtown area.
Our first stop was to view Greek statues of marble sculpted by famous historical artisans.
The art pieces then transitioned into sculptures made of metal and other materials.
We were then whisked up stairs to my favorite exhibits beyond a golden column.
I was captivated by the golden ship, a piece that others found weird.
